name: Shag Carpet Room

exits.description: Directly north is another room with an open door.  The lights are off, and there doesn't seem to be any sunlight filtered in from windows.
To the northeast the path atop the carpet cuts off, apparently ending in a cliff.
The path atop the carpet has an Eastward twist that seems to go all the way to a tiled hallway in the distance.
The path cuts off to the Southeast, allowing no further ventures in that direction.
To the South is a tiny crack in the wall you think you might just be able to squeeze through.
To the Southwest is a steep cliff.
The spider glares at you as you look West, as if to say it is not going to give you a ride back past its web.
To the Northwest you see an off-white wall.
You look up and see the ceiling
You look down and see carpet.

description: You are standing atop the carpet, which years of dirt and spilled soda has stuck together into a narrow pathway with many forks and bends. In the North and East directions you see the path curve off to more rooms, while to the South you see a tiny crack in the wall you could just barely squeeze through.
